              int health,
              int cash)
        Initializes a new Player
        Parameters:
        x - center x coordinate of player
        y - center y coordinate of player
        width - width of player
        height - height of player
        fileName - the file name for the image
        drawer - PApplet drawer to load image
        health - health of player
        cash - cash of player
